definition: The template structure holds the structure of nodes with all its configurations and properties, exactly as it should be implemented.

paragraphs.text: How the Template Structure node works
Properties include the physical arrangement of nodes, references and so on.
The actual structure of nodes contained in the template usually originates as a clone of an existing structure of nodes.
To add a tempalte strucutre, select Add Teemplate Structure on the template script node menu.
